bibl.title: Simonides fr. 11.14 W: 'Close-fighting Danaan'.
bibl.note: Analyses a couplet from a description of combat at Troy found in SIMONIDES, fr. 11. Argues that the word choice indicates the contrast between Hellen and Mede in the context of close-fighting versus bow-fighting.
bibl.seg: RAWLES Richard, Simonides fr. 11.14 W: 'Close-fighting Danaan'.

Analyses a couplet from a description of combat at Troy found in SIMONIDES, fr. 11. Argues that the word choice indicates the contrast between Hellen and Mede in the context of close-fighting versus bow-fighting.
